Posts.Content: gqmom wrote: I am 33 and I am scheduled for a biopsy tomorrow.  I had a mammogram and ultrasound last week after going to the doctor for breast pain.  On ultrasound, they found a 1cm solid cyst which has irregular edges and is "slightly tall".  I'm terrified as I've read all over the internet that these characteristics often indicate malignancy.  Has anyone had a situation like this turn out to be benign after biopsy??  I feel so alone! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: biopsy tomorrow....so scared gqmom bayarea419
